long_desc.thetext:
Using sleak, I found that Mylyn leaks handles from the UserAttributeEditor. It seems that changing
Image image = new Image(label.getDisplay(), data);
to
image = new Image(label.getDisplay(), data);
will fix the issue and was desired based on looking at the rest of the code.
Below is the stack from Sleak
java.lang.Error at org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Device.new_Object(Device.java:859) at org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Resource.init(Resource.java:86) at org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Image.<init>(Image.java:455) at org.eclipse.mylyn.internal.tasks.ui.editors.UserAttributeEditor.updateImage(UserAttributeEditor.java:92) at org.eclipse.mylyn.internal.tasks.ui.editors.UserAttributeEditor.refresh(UserAttributeEditor.java:148) at Urgs, nice find. I'll take a look.
Fixed in master and e_3_7_m_3_6_x branch. I'll try to push an update for Juno M4 to consume this important fix.
